str2: And, even, also, namely.
Of Hebrew origin; Joannes, the name of four Israelites.
A learner, disciple, pupil. From manthano; a learner, i.e. Pupil.
And, even, also, namely.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of Hebrew origin; a separatist, i.e. Exclusively religious; a Pharisean, i.e. Jewish sectary.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To fast, abstain from food. From nestis; to abstain from food.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Plural
str2: To come, go.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.

str2: Yours, thy, thine. From su; thine.
